frontend/src/components/operator/OrderFo.purpose: Form for creating new data entries/orders
key_features: Fields: entry type, title, description, quantity, priority, notes
patterns: Tailwind CSS styling with cn() utility

frontend/src/components/operator/MyOrder.purpose: List view of operator's data entries with status filtering
key_features: Status filtering (all, draft, submitted, confirmed, rejected)

frontend/src/pages/operator-dashboard.ts.purpose: Main dashboard page with two-column responsive layout
key_features: Two-column responsive design (desktop side-by-side, mobile stacked)
User info badge showing username and role

patterns_discovered: Consistent component architecture with JSDoc documentation
TypeScript strict typing throughout all components
Tailwind CSS styling with cn() utility for responsive design
API client integration (operatorApi) for backend communication
Accessibility features (ARIA labels, semantic HTML, keyboard navigation)
Status badge system with color coding and icons
Relative time formatting for better UX
Form validation with helpful error messages

Components are complete but require routing integration for full browser verification

Form validation includes specific character requirements (title min 3, description min 10)
Priority levels use color coding (low: gray, medium: blue, high: red)

approach_outcome.task: Create Operator dashboard with order creation and order history
approach_outcome.approach: Built three main components following existing codebase patterns: OrderForm for order creation, MyOrdersList for displaying orders with filtering, and OperatorDashboard as the main page container
quality_checklist: Professional UI with shadcn/ui design patterns
pending_items: Browser verification (requires routing setup in phase-7)

recommendations: Ensure routing setup in phase-7-layout-polish includes operator dashboard route

Add search functionality for order filtering
Consider adding export functionality for order reports

Add keyboard shortcuts for common dashboard actions
